mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_post (user_id, post_img_path, post_text, post_like,create_time,update_time,create_user,update_user) VALUES (#{userId}, #{postImgPath}, #{postText}, #{postLike},#{createTime},#{updateTime},#{createUser},#{updateUser})
mapper.select: select post_id,tb_post.user_id,post_img_path,post_text,post_like,user_profile_path,user_name,tb_post.create_time from tb_post,tb_user where tb_post.user_id=tb_user.user_id and post_text LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%');

select post_id,tb_post.user_id,post_img_path,post_text,post_like,user_profile_path,user_name,tb_post.create_time from tb_post,tb_user where tb_post.user_id=tb_user.user_id and post_text LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%')

select post_id,tb_post.user_id,post_img_path,post_text,post_like,user_profile_path,user_name,tb_post.create_time from tb_post,tb_user where tb_post.user_id=tb_user.user_id AND tb_post.user_id=#{userId};

select post_id,tb_post.user_id,post_img_path,post_text,post_like,user_profile_path,user_name,tb_post.create_time from tb_post,tb_user where tb_post.user_id=tb_user.user_id AND #{postId}=tb_post.post_id
mapper.update: update tb_post set post_like = #{postLike} where post_id=#{postId};
